actions.text: On agreeing to the Green (WI) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 102 - 323 (Roll no. 430).

description: Amendment sought to provide for certain criteria to be used in a referenda regarding Federal milk marketing orders.
purpose: Amendment no. 1 printed in part B of H.Rept. 106-324 to require a national referendum by dairy farmers on Secretary Glickman's proposed milk marketing reforms and choose between the use of option 1A or option 1B.
